About me

Shukurov Rashid - I strive to enhance my developer experience and be adaptable across diverse IT fields. I aim to stay relevant in various areas to contribute to innovative projects. I am eager to enrich my IT knowledge and skills by pursuing internships at different companies, where I can learn from professionals and tackle real-world challenges. This practical experience will help me become a more versatile and effective contributor to the tech industry.
